circumstances: After liftoff from Seven Islands Airport, en route to Fort Chimo (Kuujjuaq), the pilot encountered technical problems with both engines. The airplane stalled and crashed into Wabash Lake near the airport. A passenger was killed while three other occupants were seriously injured.
probable_cause:
Failure or malfunction of both engines after takeoff in icing conditions. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Failed to use anti-icing/deicing systems.
